mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_SERIAL_NUMBER AS noticeNumber , NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle , NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent , NOTICE_WRITER AS noticeWriter , NOTICE_REGISTRATION_DATE AS noticeRegistrationDate , NOTICE_UPDATE_DATE AS noticeUpdateDate FROM notice WHERE NOTICE_SERIAL_NUMBER=#{noticeNumber}

SELECT NOTICE_SERIAL_NUMBER , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_WRITER , NOTICE_REGISTRATION_DATE , NOTICE_UPDATE_DATE FROM(SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(NOTICE pk_board) */ rownum as rn , NOTICE_SERIAL_NUMBER , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_WRITER , NOTICE_REGISTRATION_DATE , NOTICE_UPDATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT COUNT(NOTICE_SERIAL_NUMBER) FROM notice
WHERE NOTICE_SERIAL_NUMBER > 0
